questions.question: Is email a good way to send login credentials and passwords?

responses.response: Yes, since email can only be viewed by the intended recipients.
No, since email is by default an encrypted protocol and threat actors can gain access to it.
Yes, because the emails are always encrypted.
Yes, emails are a secure way of electronic communication.

questions.question: Is a URL with HTTPS more secure than a URL with HTTP?

responses.response: No, HTTP is more secure than HTTPS.
Yes, because the communication with the website is encrypted with the SSL protocol.
No, because the protocol used by the URL has no impact on security.

Phishing is a cybercrime in which a target or targets are contacted by email, telephone or text message by someone posing as a legitimate institution to lure individuals into providing sensitive data such as personally identifiable information, banking and credit card details, and passwords.
Phising is a type of extreme fishing that takes place in the winter.
Phising is a new type of music derived from Hip-Hop.
Phising is a dedicated tool used by fishermen when they fish for trouts.
